relation: i haven't participated in any of their sports teams or sga events they plan but i do know that there are plenty of both to keep any student occupied and entertained based on their likes and dislikes.
just keep your head on straight, push forward, and even though its difficult it will all be worth it in the end.

bcc is a good starter college for those not quite financially ready/able to begin college life. almost all of the teachers are wonderful, as with any school there is bound to be a few harsh or horrible teachers, but it is very rare.
pageTitle: Eastern Florida State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {220818=Do your research! Don't just jump into something thinking it will be fun. I did that right out of high school, I graduated in 2006. Now I'm still going to college. Be sure to take your time, there's no rush!, 573545=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 473147=Eastern Florida State is a very safe campus. I have been attending since 2004 and have never come across any issues. The security team really keeps up with what needs to be done., 392949=Brevard Community College is a great school. The science department taught by Dr. James Yount is especially great. I attend the Titusville campus and will be attending the Cocoa campus in the fall of 2013. I am consistently surprised at the quality that this school provides. I am grateful to call it MY school.}
